translations: 极难的；困难的( hard的最高级 )；硬的；有力的；努力的

sentences.sentence: It was one of the hardest things I ever did.
sentences.translation: 这是我做过的最难的事情之一。

sentences.sentence: He skirted the hardest issues, concentrating on areas of possible agreement.
sentences.translation: 他避开最难的问题，而专注于可能达成一致意见的领域。

sentences.sentence: It was quote, 'the hardest decision of my life', unquote, and one that he lived to regret.
sentences.translation: 那是，原话起，“我一生最难作出的决定”，原话止，而且是他终生悔恨的决定。
